data.text:
2006 Football Roster

Choose a Player:

31 Anthony Featherstone

Class Redshirt Senior

Position LB

Height 5-11

Weight 205

Hometown College Park, Md.

High School Parkdale HS

Bio

Related

Stats

Historical

Biography

2006 (Redshirt Senior)

Played in 11 games, making six starts after missing the season opener versus Elon (Sept. 2)

Totaled 36 tackles, 26 of which were solo stops

Also had 6.5 tackles-for-loss, 0.5 sacks, forced one fumble, and added one quarterback hurry

Recorded a season-high nine tackles, including eight solo, and 1.0 tackle-for-loss at VMI (Oct. 14)

Also had six tackles and 1.0 tackle-for-loss versus Furman (Oct. 7) and six total stops and a quarterback hurry versus Savannah State (Nov. 4)

Picked up three tackles, 2.0 tackles-for-loss, and forced a fumble at Winston-Salem State (Sept. 30)

Had 0.5 sack at Gardner-Webb (Nov. 11)

2005 (Redshirt Junior)

Played in the first four games of the season, including making one start, before suffering a season-ending injury

Recorded six total tackles, including four solo stops on the year

Started versus Delaware State (Sept. 24), where he had two tackles and forced a fumble

Also had three tackles and 1.0 tackle-for-loss at Appalachian State (Sept. 17)

2004 (Redshirt Sophomore)

Played in seven games on the season, coming off the bench in all seven

Totaled 22 tackles, including 10 solo stops, 1.5 tackles-for-loss, and one pass breakup

Posted a season-high seven tackles in the Big South title game against Charleston Southern (Nov. 20)

Had six tackles, including 1.0 tackle-for-loss in the road win at Savannah State (Nov. 6)

Also picked up three tackles and 0.5 tackle-for-loss at VMI (Oct. 16) and three stops and a pass breakup versus Jacksonville (Nov. 13)

2003 (Redshirt Freshman)

Played in all 11 games, making two starts in the Chanticleers' inaugural season

Picked up starts at Davidson (Nov. 8) and Charleston Southern (Nov. 22)

Totaled 33 tackles, which ranked ninth on the team

Also had 1.5 tackles-for-loss and 1.0 sack

Recorded a season-high five tackles twice - versus Charleston (W. Va.) (Oct. 11) and at Davidson

Also had four total stops at Charleston Southern in the season finale

Picked up his first career sack at North Greenville (Sept. 25)

High School

Started at linebacker in the North-South All-Star Game following his senior year

Played in the Prince George's County All-Star Football Game as a senior

Was the leading tackler for the Panthers his junior and senior seasons

Recorded 94 tackles with four interceptions and one touchdown his senior season

Led Parkdale High School to the Maryland 4A State Playoffs as a junior, recording 98 tackles, four interceptions, and scoring one touchdown

Named to the honor roll all four years

Graduated with University High diploma

Personal

Full name is Anthony Maurice Featherstone

Born May 30, 1984

Son of Gregory Featherstone and Carolyn Black

Majoring in sociology
